title: Postman: postNote
text:
URI: <EndPoint>/api/notes/

Important NOTE: 
1. DO NOT delete this
2. While using post man follow this step:
      a. paste the url
      b. click on body
           c. click on [RAW] radio button
           enter  data in following format
{
    "title":"POST NOTES 2",
    "text":"URI: http://localhost:3000/api/notes/
}

title: Postman: editNote
text:
https://note-takefk-b9b6f734a0f5.herokuapp.com/<id>

Important NOTE: 
1. DO NOT delete this
2. While using post man follow this step:
      a. paste the url
      b. click on body
           c. click on [RAW] radio button
           enter  data in following format
{
    "title":"POST NOTES 2",
    "text":"URI: http://localhost:3000/api/notes/
}

title: Don't Do this:
text: 1. do not delete any note that start with "Postman"

title: Don't do this
text:
1. do not delete any note that start with "Postman"
2. do not edit (PUT) any not that start with "Postman"
